metadata.title: CVE-2023-20953 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In onPrimaryClipChanged of ClipboardListener.java, there is a possible wayto bypass factory reset protection due to incorrect UI being shown prior tosetup completion. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-251778420

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
